name: You're Telling Me A Garlic Fried This Rice?
name_original: You're Telling Me A Garlic Fried This Rice?
description:
Imagine a world, in which a simple Garlic just wants to fry rice. Sounds good right? No. Scrimps. They run rampant trying to fry the rice themselves. Gather the ingredients. Fry the rice. Save the world.

In order to beat this game, you must first collect all of the ingredients. Certain ingredients do different things, i.e: water can gives sprint, grass can does double jump.

You can only enter the door at the end of the level once you have all 9 collectables.

To see the controls, go into the controls menu in settings.

Credit to Joe Bartlett and James Parsons
